description:
Junko was once the master of her own world, but the subjects that once served her no longer fear her.

A Yume Nikki-inspired game developed by P. Yoshi for Leeble Game Jam 3.

j_v0.1.0.description:
## Initial Release
All Items, Mirrors and Buttons are randomized

## How to Connect

- Launch the game via the `Start Game.bat` file
     - **If you just open the exe the game will crash**
- Start a new game or interact with the chest in Junko's room to open the connection screen
- Follow the instructions in the console while keeping the main game window focused
j_v0.1.0.title: Junko AP v0.1.0

j_v0.1.2.description:
## Version 0.1.2 Changes (Only apworld changes)
- Fixed Logic around the HIDDEN button
- Added a YAML option to exclude the HIDDEN BUTTON (on by default)

## How to Connect

- Launch the game via the `Start Game.bat` file
     - **If you just open the exe the game will crash**
- Start a new game or interact with the chest in Junko's room to open the connection screen
- Follow the instructions in the console while keeping the main game window focused
j_v0.1.2.title: Junko AP v0.1.2
